website_summaries.verdict: The legacy of Footjoy continues with the release of the Footjoy XP. Golfers are quick to notice the benefits that they have gained from this trainer. Comfort may remain a priority, but other qualities are also distinguished. The features of the shoe are simply built to deal with the various challenges of the sport. It is waterproof, stable, supportive, and grippy. Its fashionable look is a bonus for those who are on the hunt for both style and performance.
pros: Though it sounds like a cliche, a high number of consumers declare that the Foot Flex XP is a comfortable product that it feels like wearing slippers
Despite the use of mesh, many are delighted that the waterproof upper works well with morning dew, rain, and snow
Several testers praise the spikeless outsole design because it grips the ground well
A high number of users praise how lightweight this Footjoy golf shoe is
The solid base of the shoe delivers adequate stability and support throughout from planting the foot until follow-through, says a few individuals
A couple of purchasers are delighted that they can use this shoe for everyday wear
The “new-school” look appeals to a significant number of reviewers
cons: Some of the commenters find it bothersome that there’s a clicking sound on each step
One notices that the shoe has a wrinkle on the inside lining of the toe area
A thicker ... would drastically improve the shoe because, as one says, the lug design can be felt

customer_reviews.title: Golf shoes click! Ugh
customer_reviews.text: EVERY STEP, both shoes, makes a clicking sound. Wow - so bothersome unless you want to annoy your golf buddy when he is putting.
customer_reviews.author: judith l carpenter

customer_reviews.title: very comfortable, very noisy
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these based on a review in Golf Magazine and I've worn them for 3 rounds now. I need extra wide and these fit the bill. They are very comfortable but the rubber coating on the mesh upper (it's what makes them waterproof) that runs around the shoe to about an inch above the sole makes a sort of popping noise every time it flexes and unflexes. It's an odd sound and rather annoying. My playing partners were having a lot of fun with it. You won't be able to sneak up on anybody wearing these. If I had it to do over again I'd order the original Flex model without the rubber coating.
customer_reviews.author: boxerboy

customer_reviews.title: Foot Joy does it again!!!
customer_reviews.text: Foot Joy shoes are the best shoe in support, comfort, and traction... love the style and colors! I have the blue pair and the white pair. Will be playing in AZ next week so will not be a test to the water resistance!! Arrived quickly. They fit true to size! I have narrow feet but ordered the regular width and they feel fine... since s lot of shoes don’t come in several selections of widths, I’m used to this fit. Highly recommend Foot Joy if you haven’t tried them!
customer_reviews.author: indianscoach

customer_reviews.title: Noisy shoe
customer_reviews.text: Biggest issue is they make a snap noise when walking- they will have to be returned
customer_reviews.author: Yuppy HD rider

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable shoe
customer_reviews.text: I have only worn them a couple of times but they are very comfortable. I can’t say if the waterproofing works because it was dry both times I wore them.
customer_reviews.author: Ral

customer_reviews.title: Stylish, comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Bought in a 12 wide. Unlike other FootJoy golf shoes I’ve tried, these have a roomy toe box and fit how I would expect a wide shoe to fit. These look and feel like a running shoe. My only reservation is the spikeless tread on these doesn’t seem aggressive enough for the course. I wasn’t going to chance $100 to find out. If I was a caddy these would be perfect.
customer_reviews.author: P. Berndt

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable golf shoes
customer_reviews.text: I wore these for the first time and they are very light weight and comfortable. They are also stable as a golf shoe should be. Haven't gone out early yet to test the waterproofing, but FJ's are normally good. Also, these run more true to size than the DNA's. I went a half size bigger than my DNA's and they fit fine.
customer_reviews.author: William Engel

customer_reviews.title: Bad Luck With These Shoes
customer_reviews.text: Bought my first pair a half size larger than I normally wear and the fit was ok, but they made this weird crackling noise at the instep when I walked that drove me crazy. I decided to purchase another pair a half a size smaller, my normal size, but they also made the same noise. I returned that pair. I never had a problem with Footjoy shoes until I purchased these.
customer_reviews.author: Golfjunky

customer_reviews.title: Tighter fit than expected but OK
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for comfort as a walker. I have only played once in these new shoes. They were a little snug on width given my past experience of shoes that have more width - they were a little tight around the instep but I do not mind it since I like a tight shoe. They were comfortable otherwise as indicated by my feet did not experience soreness or ache.
customer_reviews.author: CEPJR

customer_reviews.title: Good looking shoes but they not waterproof or water system.
customer_reviews.text: I bought them on September 20, 2020, the problem is that the shoes are supposed to be waterproof or water-resistant and wet Ceel inside as you can see, I used them for the first time on October 2nd 2020, and one of the pictures you will see that I had their shoes on the sun to dry.
customer_reviews.author: Nercy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I typically wear an 11.5, but tried that and just a tad tight. 12 was perfect. Great looking, superb traction, light weight...excellent golf shoe.
customer_reviews.author: SCWer

customer_reviews.title: size down by a half
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. Order my regular size and they are half size to big. Need toe room but these almost looked like clown shoes. Reorder down by a half, received and they are just right.
customer_reviews.author: Tee

customer_reviews.title: Great Golf shoe
customer_reviews.text: Best golf shoe I ever had. Liked them so much I ordered a second pair. Very comfortable. Wider sole to give better stability. Fit well and to size. Would buy again for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Roger

customer_reviews.title: Good quality shoe but sizing is way off
customer_reviews.text: Shoes are well-made and I like the styling. Definitely comfortable for walking the course. My issue is the sizing is off my 1 full size. I wear a 14 and have a good fit with Adidas and Nike. 14 in this shoe is at least a 15.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Flexible and spikeless
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my husband who pretty much golf's daily. They fit as expected, lightweight compared to leather, and have no spikes to worry about losing.
customer_reviews.author: mrs_goatman

customer_reviews.title: Best pair of gold shoes ever
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these gold shoes. They are very comfortable, lightweight and fit true. I will be ordering another pair or two in other colors.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Need a doctor with these shoes
customer_reviews.text: Awful,ruined my feet Walked 18 had to tape my toes at 7 I will never buy this brand again I’m still walking bad ,it’s been three days
customer_reviews.author: thosewhoplay

customer_reviews.title: Worth the Money
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a comfortable water resistant shoe with good support so I could walk 18 holes pain free. This shoe meets all my requirements. I will be buying FootJoy in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Red

customer_reviews.title: Awesome look and comfort!
customer_reviews.text: Here you go! I have about 10 pairs of golf shoes. I usually buy Foot Joy, but none have fit and worn like these. I bought them in white after I played with them. I will toss my old shoes out and only play with these shoes! Due to the Covid restrictions, I have been walking. No aches, no blisters, fresh after the round. Awesome look and comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really Great Shoe
customer_reviews.text: Super comfortable and works great in terms of repelling morning dew during early rounds of golf. I actually bought a second pair. Particularly like that the tongue and back of the shoe has pulls. Lightweight and very comfortable to walk during a round.
customer_reviews.author: Paul L.

customer_reviews.title: Comfort and fit are extraordinary
customer_reviews.text: First, Foot Joy shoes run about a 1/2 size large. I normally wear a 12 1/2, I bought size 12, they fit perfectly. I walk when I play golf and these shoes are the most comfortable I've owned in years.
customer_reviews.author: dmac07

customer_reviews.title: Great Walking Shoes
customer_reviews.text: This FootJoy is designed for walking a long golf course. It's stylish and comfortable. Not sure if it's waterproof but time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: Kojiro

customer_reviews.title: Footjoy runs BIG
customer_reviews.text: Shoes look nice and seem like decent quality but the size 9 I ordered were bigger than my son’s size 10 shoes. There was about an inch of room in front of my big toe. I had to return these, and try on and buy at a local store. I ended up buying an 8. Every other shoe I own is a 9. The store owner said FootJoy is know to run large on their shoes and shirts.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey A Sloss

customer_reviews.title: The shoes are extremely comfortable to wear on and off the golf course
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are extremely comfortable to wear on and off the golf course. You can put these on in the morning play around of golf And leave them on until you get home.Not only do they feel great on your feet but they look really good too.
customer_reviews.author: jonathan calvert

customer_reviews.title: Great Product for the Price
customer_reviews.text: I've found over the years that the FootJoy brand has had some hits and misses. But, this particular one is a hit for me. Very comfortable, performs great, and looks pretty dang good too. Overall, not the most expensive option; not the cheapest either. But a great value for the weekend warrior out trying to save par on a regular basis.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: No pain, all comfort
customer_reviews.text: I have wide and large feet so finding a comfortable show is hard. This one fits perfectly and I can play three days in a row with zero pain from my feet.
customer_reviews.author: ryan buske

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and Light
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are comfortable sized as expected and very light. Glad I made the decision to go with these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: DougR

customer_reviews.title: Looks good, Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: If you like to walk the course, here is your shoe. I did not have to break it in and walked 18 holes with complete comfort. Water resistant, and cleaned up well.
customer_reviews.author: Raven

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Great fit, but the grip on the bottom is weak and would not use with any moisture.
customer_reviews.author: Wade Bowman

customer_reviews.title: Great golf shoe
customer_reviews.text: Wanted a tennis shoe feeling shoe without looking like a running shoe. perfect mix in between. very comfy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No longer waterproof (7 months since purchase)
customer_reviews.text: Love the design and feel. I rotate these shoes with several other golf shoes. Play 3-4 times a week. They lost their waterproof capability this morning. Purchased in January. I have worn them maybe 30-40 times.
customer_reviews.author: Mary H. Poulin

customer_reviews.title: Not a great fit
customer_reviews.text: This shoe is not comfortable even though its spikeless and supposed to be comfortable. I purchased a double wide shoe and for most companies, it is a natural fit but this shoe is still tight around the toe areas. I would not recommend this shoe for any golfers who play regularly.
customer_reviews.author: Faith Chang

customer_reviews.title: FOOTJOY
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are exactly what I expected from FootJoy. The look and feel like sneakers and waterproof too!!
customer_reviews.author: Randy Schroder

customer_reviews.title: Noisy shoes...
customer_reviews.text: Shoes seem to fit properly, but they make a flopping sound in the toe area when you take a step. It’s extremely annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Derrick J. Holmes

customer_reviews.title: Size13W fit as expected
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 13W golf shoes. As these were the 5th(?) pair of Foot Joys, the shoes fit as expected. Thus far, I've only played 2 rounds in them, but support and fit feel good.
customer_reviews.author: Ron N.

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe for walkers.
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I disliked was the grip in wet conditions. I would slip occasionally. The is an exceptional shoe for walkers despite the minor grip issue. I just bought another pair in a different color.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice-but could be better
customer_reviews.text: Nice shoe. Could use little more insole padding underfoot. Typical FJ seems to run narrower than most— glad I ordered a wide width. Seems to meet ‘waterproof ‘ expectations/claims.
customer_reviews.author: newfire

customer_reviews.title: Great Look and Feel
customer_reviews.text: Great look and fit perfectly with the medium width. Comfortable to wear and a great value for a Foot Joy shoe. Got them in White and look better than shown! Love them.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Garritano

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoes
customer_reviews.text: Shoes were timely delivered as expected. Shoes are comfortable and stylish. I am very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: James E. Fuquay

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe, comfy to walk 18 but runs big, order size down
customer_reviews.text: Order a size to a size and a half down from what you normally wear. I wear a 13 narrow in the Dry Joy. Had to reorder and get the 12 in the XP
customer_reviews.author: Aaron P

customer_reviews.title: Great all around
customer_reviews.text: Was a gift, but was told they fit great, look great & helped their golf game.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Draper

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are comfortable and look great. They could be worn as every day shoes. Some have complained about a clicking noise, played 18 holes and heard nothing.
customer_reviews.author: TWL

customer_reviews.title: Shoes that fit
customer_reviews.text: Foot Joy golf shoes are the only brand, that I can find, that make a shoe to fit my narrow shoe width.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Golf Shoe
customer_reviews.text: This is a great golf shoe, very comfortable, stylish, plus it’s waterproof. I have a wide foot and the medium width actually fits perfect.
customer_reviews.author: HardDrive

customer_reviews.title: Awesomeness
customer_reviews.text: Super comfortable and yet sturdy. Have no idea about reviews of those citing “noises” but these shoes look and feel great.
customer_reviews.author: rd

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes. After I bought mine I bought a pair for my son for his birthday. HIGHLY RECOMMEND!
customer_reviews.author: Steve Garnett

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable shoe for walking the course
customer_reviews.text: Love the look but most importantly the comfort. Also agree as stated at time of purchase. Size is as normally expected for fit.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Fisher

customer_reviews.title: Footjoy Flex XP
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. A little larger than I expected, but that's okay.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Fully satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Fit was as expected and shoe comfort is better than expected. Fully satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Darren

customer_reviews.title: very,very comfortable golf shoe.
customer_reviews.text: Played 4 rounds of golf in this shoe....no rounds in my other golf shoes!
customer_reviews.author: frank s.

customer_reviews.title: Made me better at golf!
customer_reviews.text: This shoe fit so well and was so comfortable it actually made me better at golf. Took about 4 strokes off of my game!
customer_reviews.author: Alex N

customer_reviews.title: most comfortable golf shoe I've ever owned
customer_reviews.text: only negative was that when playing early morning with dew on the ground I slipped a couple of times.
customer_reviews.author: Russ

customer_reviews.title: Comfort and Fit
customer_reviews.text: Great for hot weather. Noticed a tapping noise from sole. Not sure if it will subside as I wear them.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Glasser

customer_reviews.title: No more ibuprofen after a round...
customer_reviews.text: Big guys golf too. This extra wide shoe is ridiculously comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: michael j.

customer_reviews.title: Returned - Too big
customer_reviews.text: Too big. Should have ordered a half size smaller. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: Cwroach23

customer_reviews.title: Fits as expected
customer_reviews.text: Shoes fit well,I’ve played three rounds and I walk it’s a good shoe
customer_reviews.author: KP

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. Good traction. Will shave 3 strokes off your game!
customer_reviews.author: Gary G

customer_reviews.title: Bad fit
customer_reviews.text: I would like to return these golf shoes . They are giving my husband calluses
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what you would expect from Footjoy. Comfortable. Good traction.
customer_reviews.author: Dano1215

product_meta.title: Footjoy Men's Fj Flex Xp Golf Shoes
product_meta.description: Discover the athletic-infused styling of the all-new waterproof fj flex XP.
feature_bullets: Waterproof mesh - lightweight performance waterproof mesh delivers incredible comfort, breathability and all-day comfort
Complete support - a soft EVA midsole provides increased underfoot cushioning, enhanced comfort and exceptional stability
Versatile traction - The versa-trax outsole is engineered with traction elements to create an outsole that is perfect for on course performance with wear-to-the-course versatility
Laser sport fit - offers a full rounded toe character with a standard fit across the forefoot and instep. A toe spring and a slightly narrow heel completes the athletic profile
